p: The EPM was used to investigate the anxiolytic effect of the PNEO after acute and repetitive treatment. The no. of open arm entries (NEOA) and the period of permanence in the open arm (TPOA) increased significantly after acute administration of PNEO 10, PNEO 50, and diazepam when compared with the control group ( Figure 3A and 3B, left panel). Repeated treatment with all doses of PNEO and the reference drug, buspirone for 21 days also increased the NEOA and TPOA significantly ( Figure 3A and 3B, right panel).
